医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现高膳食磷与乳腺癌之间存在关联研究人员评估了乳腺癌发病率与不同膳食磷酸盐水平的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-finds-association- Between-high-dietary-phosphrus-and-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-finds-association- Between-high-dietary-phosphorus-and-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e0dc792-3b94-4faf-833d-3825104f6755 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 10:30:00 -0400 Study finds association between high dietary phosphorus and breast cancer
压力性生活事件和失眠可能会增加绝经后女性患房颤的风险绝经后，估计有四分之一的女性可能出现心律不齐；根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊）上的最新研究，被称为心房颤动的人在一生中，压力性生活事件和失眠是主要的促成因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Stressful-life-events-and-insomnia-may-increase-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Stressful-life-events-and-insomnia-may-increase-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b3558ae-e88d-4a0a-a0cc-6db299ecebc8 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 09:58:04 -0400 Stressful life events and insomnia may increase risk of atrial fibrillation in postmenopausal women
运动可能有助于改善前列腺癌患者的性功能前列腺癌是世界上最常见的癌症之一，它不仅使被诊断者的生命处于危险之中，而且还会由于治疗的副作用而严重影响患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Exercise-may-help-improve-sex-function-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Exercise-may-help-improve-sex-function-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ddfa320-263f-4551-b0e2-729beef2c3fa Wed, 30 Aug 2023 09:37:15 -0400 Exercise may help improve sexual function in prostate cancer patients
GADx 的 BotrytisAlert 现在可以检测葡萄酒生产中几个关键点的作物真菌病原体Global Access Diagnostics (GADx) 是一家社会企业，也是横向流动和快速诊断技术的领先开发商，今天宣布扩大了其低成本快速诊断测试 BotrytisAlert 的应用范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/GADxs-BotrytisAlert-now-detects-fungal-crop-pathogen-across-several-ritic-points-in-wine-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/GADxs-BotrytisAlert-now-detects-fungal-crop-pathogen-across-several-ritic-points-in-wine-product.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d14174eb-841d-4585-86b2-4ad3bee45d7c Wed, 30 Aug 2023 09:05:00 -0400 GADx's BotrytisAlert now detects fungal crop pathogen across several critical points in wine production
审查发现牛奶低聚糖与婴儿大脑发育之间的相关性在《营养》杂志最近发表的一篇文章中，研究人员调查了牛奶低聚糖 (MOS) 对早期神经认知和大脑发育影响的最新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Review-finds-correlation- Between-milk-oligobiotics-and-infant-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Review-finds-correlation- Between-milk-oligo Sugars-and-infant-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0aa89a84-cfed-4823-9e6a-7be9cbb9bdde Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:58:00 -0400 Review finds correlation between milk oligosaccharides and infant brain development
Bio-Rad 利用新型 StarBright 染料增强了兽医免疫学研究的流式细胞术功能生命科学研究和临床诊断产品领域的全球领导者 Bio-Rad Laboratories, Inc. 今天宣布推出第 29 种 StarBright 染料 StarBright Red 670，并通过另外 29 种与 StarBright 缀合的高度验证的抗体扩展了其当前产品系列Blue 700 和 StarBright Violet 610 染料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Bio-Rad-enhances-flow-cytometry-capability-for-veterinary-immunology-research-with-new-StarBright-Dyes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Bio-Rad-enhances-flow-cytometry-capability-for-veterinary-immunology-research-with-new-StarBright-Dyes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d5252b6-58dc-43d9-8e3d-0921cd522cca Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:55:00 -0400 Bio-Rad enhances flow cytometry capabilities for veterinary immunology research with new StarBright Dyes
INTEGRA Biosciences 的真空抽吸系统帮助研究人员解决狗表观基因组问题首尔国立大学兽医学院 Cho 实验室的研究人员正在使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 的 VACUSAFE 安全抽吸系统和 VACUSIP 便携式抽吸系统来帮助他们培养患有癌症的家养狗的类器官，作为比较医学研究计划的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/INTEGRA-Biosciences-vacuum-aspiration-systems-help-researchers-solve-the-dog-epigenome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/INTEGRA-Biosciences-vacuum-aspiration-systems-help-researchers-solve-the-dog-epigenome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6131911-2855-40aa-acd1-7e71c16d97b3 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:53:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences' vacuum aspiration systems help researchers solve the dog epigenome
低碳水化合物饮食作为改善糖尿病患者血糖控制的策略研究人员评估了低碳水化合物饮食对 2 型糖尿病患者血糖调节的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Low-碳水化合物-diets-as-strategies-for-improving-glycemic-control-in-diabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/低碳水化合物-饮食-as-strategies-for-improving-glycemic-control-in-diabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a96876ee-053e-432a-ae5e-be13e99ffa5c Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:52:00 -0400 Low-carbohydrate diets as strategies for improving glycemic control in diabetic patients
饮用水硬度与心血管疾病死亡率相关吗？饮用水总硬度可以预防心血管疾病死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Is-drinking-water-hardness-linked-with-cardioangio-disease-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Is-drinking-water-hardness-linked-with-cardioangio-disease-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45756215-0970-461d-857e-283b712f4119 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:49:00 -0400 Is drinking water hardness associated with cardiovascular disease mortality?
研究表明，对于年轻健康的成年人来说，食用全蛋比食用蛋白更有好处研究人员调查了不同的鸡蛋饮食对健康年轻人的免疫、血液学和代谢临床特征的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-suggests-whole-egg-conspiration-has-benefits-over-egg-white-conspiration-in-young-healthy-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Study-suggests-whole-egg-conspiration-has-benefits-over-egg-white-conspiration-in-young-healthy-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3574ab7e-a60a-4f7b-bcdc-2808afbfda38 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 08:46:00 -0400 Study suggests whole egg consumption has benefits over egg white consumption in young, healthy adults
